error.message: Parameter $entityManager of method Drupal\yasm\Services\GroupsStatistics::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to yasm.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
